body: One day, he goes to pick her up, but sees her leave with that guy. He follows them and sees she goes to that apt. He waits and calls her, asks her where she is. She lies. He says okay and waits, she opens the door with the guy there and says her to shocked face. "We're divorcing. Have fun with your new boyfriend. Oh, and you both owe me compensation."
Moral :- make your wife feel pleasure like she is in hell otherwise the rest is history. (lol)

@polijoligon NTR isn't about putting yourself in the evil guys shoes, it's about the pure feeling of Jealousy, or simply sexual pleasure from seeing your significant other getting fucked by other people. That is a positive mindset for a fucked up tag, but ultimately it is still not a good thing, you're only masking up the tragedy of stealing a loved one as if you're the one doing it. But in the end, it happened and she/he is no longer yours and only continuing to prolong  and hide the pain. If you want to be the bad guy, go read cheating, go read netori, but maybe if the netorare tag was divided into netori, netorase, netorare then that can help you. But good NTR nonetheless, 5/7.
